thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Email Marketing Coordinator - Sports Equipment

title: Email Marketing Coordinator - Sports Equipment
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. ™ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Email Marketing Coordinator   The Email Marketing Coordinator coordinates the execution of our email marketing efforts across multiple retail sites. A major component of this job is communicating and syncing our plans with other departments and groupsso the ability to work and play well with others is a must.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
